definitions: the state of not being arranged in a straight line or in correct relative positions

examples.text: the nonalignment of the holes allows the light to become diffused

shortDefinitions: state of not being arranged in a straight line

definitions: lack of alliance or affiliation with other nations or groups, especially politically

examples.text: a policy of neutrality and military nonalignment
the report shows a total nonalignment of the different agencies

shortDefinitions: lack of alliance with other nations or groups
